# Description

Working for two strategic programs at EUR (Evaluating Societal Impact and Recognition & Rewards), I strive to contribute to the university's impact-driven identity and to help embed the Recognition & Rewards program in EUR's culture. As a media studies graduate, my main research and work interests are communication and media, related to societal change and impact.

member_name <- "Maud van Roessel"

  dplyr::select(c("open source software", all_of(special_skill), "open access", "data management", "reproducible analysis", "data sharing", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)
